atk-abh03a37:2_0: 892. Idāni parinibbānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yasmā arahā sabbaññuvisaye appahīnasaṁyojanova
atk-abh03a37:2_1: parinibbāyati, tasmā atthi kiñci saṁyojanaṁ appahāya parinibbāna”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:2_2: seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a37:5_0: 894-895. Idāni kusalacittakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi
atk-abh03a37:5_1: sato sampajānova parinibbāti, tasmā kusalacitto parinibbāyatīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a37:5_2: andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ yasmā kusalacitto
atk-abh03a37:5_3: nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti, tasmā tenatthena codetuṁ arahā puññābhisaṅkhārantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a37:5_4: Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Sato sampajānoti idaṁ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṁ
atk-abh03a37:5_5: vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, na kusalacittadīpanatthaṁ. Tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a37:8_0: 896. Idāni āneñjakathā nāma hoti. Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti
atk-abh03a37:8_1: sallakkhetvā “arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ
atk-abh03a37:8_2: uttarāpathakānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Pakaticitteti
atk-abh03a37:8_3: bhavaṅgacitte. Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena
atk-abh03a37:8_4: kālaṁ karonti. Iti naṁ iminā atthena codetuṁ evamāha. Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave
atk-abh03a37:8_5: arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṁ hoti, ayaṁ pana pañho pañcavokārabhavavasena uddhaṭo.
atk-abh03a37:8_6: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a37:11_0: 897. Idāni dhammābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṁ mātukucchiyaṁ
atk-abh03a37:11_1: vasitvā nikkhantaṁ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a37:11_2: ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha
atk-abh03a37:11_3: naṁ “yadi tattha dhammābhisamayo atthi, dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi
atk-abh03a37:11_4: bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha. Suttassātiādi bhavaṅgavāraṁ
atk-abh03a37:11_5: sandhāya vuttaṁ. Gabbhaseyyāya hi yebhuyyena bhavaṅgameva pavattati. Teneva satto
atk-abh03a37:11_6: kiriyamayappavattābhāvā sutto, bhāvanānuyogassa abhāvā pamatto, kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṁ
atk-abh03a37:11_7: satisampajaññānaṁ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti, tathārūpassa kuto dhammābhisamayoti?
atk-abh03a37:14_0: 898-900. Idāni tissopikathā nāma honti. Tattha acirajātānaṁ pana sotāpannānaṁ arahattappattiṁ
atk-abh03a37:14_1: suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṁ gabbhaṁ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī”ti
atk-abh03a37:14_2: ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā “atthi dhammābhisamayo”ti ca “atthi tattha arahattappattī”ti
atk-abh03a37:14_3: ca idhāpi yesaṁ laddhiyo, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a37:17_0: 901-902. Idāni abyākatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā, sā ca
atk-abh03a37:17_1: kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato “sabbaṁ supinagatassa cittaṁ abyākata”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:17_2: seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaññeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a37:17_3: itarassa. Sesamettha yathā pāḷimeva niyyāti. Supinagatassa cittaṁ abbohārikanti idaṁ
atk-abh03a37:17_4: āpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṁ
atk-abh03a37:17_5: pavattati, vatthuvikopanaṁ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṁ paññapetuṁ. Iminā
atk-abh03a37:20_0: 903-905. Idāni āsevanapaccayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sabbe dhammā khaṇikā,
atk-abh03a37:20_1: na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṁ āsevati nāma. Tasmā natthi kiñci āsevanapaccayatā.
atk-abh03a37:20_2: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṁ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a37:20_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṁ
atk-abh03a37:20_4: nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṁ. Taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a37:23_0: 906-907. Idāni khaṇikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sabbasaṅkhatadhammā aniccā, tasmā
atk-abh03a37:23_1: ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva. Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṁ bhijjati, eko cirenāti ko
atk-abh03a37:23_2: ettha niyāmoti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṁ; te sandhāya ekacittakkhaṇikāti
atk-abh03a37:23_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Citte mahāpathavītiādīsu tesaṁ tathā saṇṭhānaṁ
atk-abh03a37:23_4: apassanto paṭikkhipati. Cakkhāyatanantiādi “yadi sabbe ekacittakkhaṇikā bhaveyyuṁ,
atk-abh03a37:23_5: cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṁyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu”nti codanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a37:23_6: vuttaṁ. Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, pavattaṁ
atk-abh03a37:23_7: sandhāya laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti. Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikāti
atk-abh03a37:23_8: yasmā niccā na honti, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṁ vadati. Taṁ avuttasadisamevāti.
